title: Young Ukrainians are throwing ‘repair raves’ to rebuild their embattled cities
content:
DJs spin while grassroots activists work to clear rubble left behind by assaults from Russian forces.

After more than 250 days of assaults from Russian forces, Ukrainian resistance is taking more surprising forms. In an attempt to reconnect to their pre-invasion cutting-edge techno scene, a group of young activists have been organizing “repair raves” to attract people to help with the massive cleanup effort, dancing together while they do it.

Read Full Story
